biotools.summary: DeepECA is an end-to-end learning framework for protein contact prediction from a multiple sequence alignment. It can be used for predicting protein contact residues and secondary structures from its amino acid sequence by using Deep Neural Network.

bioschemas.name: DeepECA
bioschemas.summary: DeepECA is an end-to-end learning framework for protein contact prediction from a multiple sequence alignment. It can be used for predicting protein contact residues and secondary structures from its amino acid sequence by using Deep Neural Network.
